description_text:
Hi! I’m thinking about buying Simsonn Plus X (
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-plus-x-pedals?variant=51288365138234),
but I want to make sure they ship to Chile first.

If these pedals can be shipped to Chile, I’d like to know whether I only
have to pay the shipping cost shown on the website, or if there are any
additional charges like taxes, customs fees, or import duties. In the past,
I’ve been told I only needed to pay for shipping when buying things from
abroad, but then I ended up being charged more than what I was originally
told.

conversations.body_text: Hi Maty,  Please note that the shipment is from Germany, so no customs duty will be incurred.
